Class Controller

extends Object

    1.1
    Author:

      • updateView

        public void updateView​(String numArabic,
                       int numRoman,
                       int romanArabicFlag)
        Updates view class to pass the calculated results
        Parameters:
        numArabic - Arabic number as result or input value
        numRoman - Roman numeral as result or input value
        romanArabicFlag - flags which argument is input and output and vice versa
